headline: Dover (DOV) Celebrates 70 Years Of Consistent Dividend Increases With US$0.52 Payout
summary: Dover (DOV) announced a modest increase in its quarterly cash dividend, marking the 70th consecutive year of such hikes, underscoring its long-term commitment to returning capital to shareholders. Despite this, Dover's stock price was flat over the last week, in contrast to the broader market rally where major indices, including the Nasdaq, reached record highs. The tech stock surge driven by industry giants like Apple and significant market rebounds appear to have limited the impact of...
